product_context.title: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: I've been buying these for my reptiles' heat lamps for years. Accurate, easy to use, and perfectly priced. I can never have too many of these.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2025
reviews.title: Good thermostats

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: I have a reading lamp with a compact fluorescent bulb that sometimes is too bright. This device seemed the obvious solution. Except that it did not dim the bulb. But the lamp now dims perfectly - after I changed the bulb to an LED. I am also concerned about how long it will last. Plugging the lamp into it was very difficult, as if there was some sort of internal misalignment. So I think it will have to spend its life serving only that lamp, as I fear that unplugging it and moving it may cause it to malfunction.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2025
reviews.title: Well, it works for LEDs

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: Lutron ruined this device at some point! We have two from many years ago (one finally wore out) that have a red indicator that glows softly at night so you can see the blasted thing on the nightstand. They have REMOVED THE INDICATOR! Not only that, there is just an overall decrease in quality. The detent used to have a smooth feel to it. Now, it's much harder to slide on and off through the detent. Appears to be another case of reducing the cost to manufacture for more profit and charging the same and the customer gets a worse product. I don't know why I'm, even giving it 2 stars. Very sad. I'm returning it and will buy some Chinese brand that has the indicator.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2025
reviews.title: Lutron! How could you ruin a good product?

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: I ordered one of these on Nov 28, 2020. I use it to control some under counter led lighting. Worked great till now. Still turns on and off but Rudolf can no longer hit full power. In fact on full, we're maybe at half brightness. I really don't care about the dimmer feature so I'm replacing it with a similar product that just turns things on and off. Very disappointed that it didn't hold up and now I have to spend more money and time making things work again because this product is unreliable.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024
reviews.title: Disappointed that it didn't last

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: Got this to add to a small table lamp my wife uses next to her chair for those winter mornings when she wakes early. The 60W equivalent LED is too bright in those situations, so the Lutron dimmer is perfect to set it to a comfortable level. The lamp has a line switch on it, so my wife leaves the dimmer slide set at her desired brightness and just turns off the line switch. That way the brightness is always the same. The only downside is you have the lamp cord (the clear on in the photo) running TO the outlet, and the dimmer switch cord returning FROM the outlet (one of the black cords in the photo) to where you want to have the slider sitting--which is typically right beside the lamp. Therefore, two cords. But when it's dark, who cares? The MOST IMPORTANT THING: The dimmable LED light bulb does not flicker at any position of the slider.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2024
reviews.title: Flicker free with LED

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: When my lights are plugged into this dimmer, the lights begin to flicker, even when the dimmer is at maximum. The product is unusable because of the flickering.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: This dimmer works great for corded lamps using dimmable LED bulbs such as Philips Warm Glow. The dimming function is smooth, with no flickering at any setting from full dim to full bright. The dimmer control sits nicely on your lamp table and features non-slip rubber strips on the bottom to help prevent the control from sliding off your table.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2024
reviews.title: Smooth Dimmer for LED

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: Works fine. the one i had lasted was the white version of this, and lasted 5 years. it's a plug-in thing, and all you have to do is plug it into an electrical wall socket type thing and then plug your lamp into the Lutron's socket. this dims fine and i use it on an incandescent GE 'reveal' 75w. bulb, and i normally only have it at half-power, via the slider, and it keeps the bulb under-powered and the bulbs typically have lasted a year.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2024
reviews.title: works fine, robust build

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Credenza LED+ 100-Watt Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Switch, TTCL-100H-BL, Black
reviews.text: These dimmers work great! I’ve had this one for probably over a year now and love it. I finally bought one for my husband’s lamp too because when I’m trying to fall asleep before him, it’s so bright. Now that he can put it on the dimmer setting, I have no issues going to bed earlier. It makes the room really cozy when you want darker lighting. Also, I don’t have to reach as far because the switch hangs over my bed which is amazing!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.title: Works great/Cozy lighting!
